item.title: ðŸ”´ 21:55 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 21:55 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
